content: अहरणीय, अहार्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not to be stolen, removed, or taken away; अहार्यं ब्राह्मणद्रव्यं राज्ञां नित्यमिति स्थितिः <ls>Ms. 9. 189.</ls> {@--2@} Not to be won over (by fraud), devoted, loyal; <ls>Ms. 7. 217.</ls> {@--3@} Firm, unflinching, inexorable; °निश्चया <ls>Dk. 41</ls>, <ls>Ku. 5. 8.</ls> --र्यः A mountain; °ता, °त्वं not being liable to be taken away, security; <ls>H. Pr. 4.</ls>
